meanings.sent1: I have less candy than you.
meanings.sent2: She ate less cake than her brother.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel had less nuts than the chipmunk.
meanings.sent4: His wallet was less full than a balloon losing air.
meanings.sent5: The jar had less marbles after the game.

meanings.definition: Not as much as something else
meanings.sent1: He runs less quickly than his friend.
meanings.sent2: She talks less loudly than the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed less often than usual.
meanings.sent4: The sun shines less brightly on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The flowers smell less sweet in the rain.

meanings.definition: To a smaller extent or degree
meanings.sent1: They will travel less this year.
meanings.sent2: He sings less now that he is older.
meanings.sent3: The river flows less after the dam was built.
meanings.sent4: Her smile shines less brightly when she is sad.
meanings.sent5: The fire burns less fiercely as it dies down.
